p: The MINSA used the 1997 World Health Organization (WHO) clinical classification of dengue fever (DF), dengue hemorrhagic fever (DHF), and dengue shock syndrome (DSS) from 1993 to 2011, whereas dengue with or without warning signs and severe dengue WHO 2009 classification has been used since 2012.
